website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Hook and Loop 813 received an abundance of praises. Consumers, in general, liked how comfortable it was for daily use especially with its motion control features. However, there were grievances about the overall construction of the shoe. But regardless of the negative comments, it was still the preferred footwear of many users because of the easy-access closure.
pros: A majority of the owners liked the New Balance Hook and Loop 813 because the strap closure made it easy to put on and take off the shoe
The trainer was considered as comfortable by many of its users
A lot of purchasers were contented with the sizing and the fit of the trainer
Several testers appreciated the Rollbar posting system as it improved their gait
cons: A good number of reviewers thought that the footwear was poorly constructed because the outsole wore out quickly and the straps stretched out in a short span of time
The product felt too stiff for a couple of buyers

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, Sturdy and Consistent
customer_reviews.text: As usual, the New Balance athletic shoe in 12 4E fits my husband perfectly. He has diabetes and his shoes cannot be the least bit tight. New Balance is extremely consistent in their sizing. They are a very supportive and sturdy shoe. My husband prefers Velcro straps for easy adjustment. His other preference is the bone color which wasn't an option this time. He settled for gray and seems to like them, too. We've purchased New Balance for many years and they have never left us down.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes even for stubborn old men
customer_reviews.text: My mil wanted me to order these for my fil. She wears these shoes and loves them. Unfortunately she ordered them too big for him and he refused to admit it or tell us how to fix the problem with a different size or width. They are the size and width that they should be, they are just not the size and width he needs. These are excellent shoes. Especially for the elderly that have trouble bending over and tying shoes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: lsal mom

customer_reviews.title: Assuming they fit (velcro is your friend), these are great - especially for the older active crowd
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a resident in Alzheimer's care. Happiest day in a while. He loves how easy they are to put on. From all reports about the only time he takes them off is to shower. Such an everyday thing that delivered boundless joy to a 90 year old that doesn't experience a lot of joy. Love, yes. Joy, not as much. But he's my Dad and I love him as a hero and a parent and a friend.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different design, this model no longer made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, I have been using new balance for years. I was surprised that this model is no longer made in the USA. Slightly different fastener design from the last model. I use these shoes every day all day...they usually last about 6-7 months before the cushion gives out. Arch support is minimal, but I use orthotics so the problem is minimized. Overall very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: SouthDenverDave

customer_reviews.title: Foot fit but was not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for walking on sidewalks and hard dirt paths. Just for around the house. My feet hurt so bad after wearing for about 30 minutes I went out and bought some Dr. Scholls (23.00). But now my foot seemed like it was riding high in the shoe and only helped a little, I was walking behind my shed on hard packed dirt with Oak leaves on the ground slight down hill and down I went like walking on ice. Shoes are not comfortable hard to walk in with no traction. You should not buy shoes online period. I'm real sorry but this is not a good walking shoe for older people.
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD PRITCHETT

customer_reviews.title: Made a mistake and found out too late.
customer_reviews.text: This 813H looked like what I needed so bought June 24, 2020. When they got here fit was excellent but since then not too great Aug 11. I stepped off out back stairs and when my left heel came down I almost twisted my left ankle. Due to being 77 I said to myself "learn to walk stupid" . My cane and the banister luckily did their job. So next day I gave them another try, not good. A slow walk reveals that the "special heel roll bar may have broken. Walking in them now is very much like when a gel pack heel has lost it's gel. Looks like $60 down the sewer.
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice footwear, lack durability
customer_reviews.text: Comfortale, light weight, full leather without water invasive holes. Lack durability. Bought in July of 2018 and in October the right has serious issues. See pictures
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Ptak

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CONCEPT BUT POORLY EXECUTED
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS INTENDED FOR MY HUSBAND: FOR ORDINARY WALKING, NOTHING DEMANDING. THE STRAPS ARE INCLINED TO CREASE SEVERELY (OFF CENTER IN THE METAL 'LOOP'). THEY'LL FAIL LONG BEFORE THE SHOE WOULD, UNDER CONSERVATIVE USE, ORDINARILY DETERIORATE. NOW TO RESUME OUR QUEST FOR A MUVH BETTER ALTERNATIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: The top of the tungue pops out from between the sides and allows too much heel movement.
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall design of the shoe and the convenience of the hook and loop closure. Unfortunately the top of the tongue pops up between the sides above the upper strap. That upper strap is not high enough so the combination causes an insecure fit, allowing my heel to move up and down against the back causing my socks to pull inward and down. I really wanted to like this shoe, but it just doesn't fit well, so back it goes. Ended up with the MW928 which is a great shoe and fits well but with standard laces. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: V1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that dissatisfies me is that an overpronator, the angle/inclination of the heel makes for a clunky landing on the ground. But since I wanted an extra wide and comfortable walking shoe with the convenience of velcro straps, I didn't really have a choice in shoes that would also satisfy my pronation. It is a comfortable shoe, but the toe box of the XW size is a bit wider & looser than I expected or needed, though acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: New Balance had the perfect shoe with the 411 version. Why they discontinued it I have no idea but these newer 813’s Are no where near as comfortable. The insoles are very hard. The 411 model had the perforation holes in strategic places so your foot could breath. These 813’s do not have any breathing holes, ZERO so on hot sunny days your feet get very hot and sweaty. Come on New Balance, bring back the 411!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I'd say highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, but I rarely award 5 stars. These are great shoes. Can't say the finish on the black looks great, but it is good enough. Not sure what is leather versus synthetic, but again the shoes fit very well and the hook/loop thing works fine. I need to velcro thing because my hands sometimes don't work well due to Parkinson's.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Beautiful appearance. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality materials and workmanship. My last pair of NuBalance shoes lasted over six years! These feel wonderful and I’m going to get a second pair for the winter weather. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Deeley

customer_reviews.title: piece are glued not sewn
customer_reviews.text: bought these shoes in April and by June they were broken. Not worn every day and not worn during anything athletic. The piece that holds the strap is GLUED to the shoe. I was surprised to see this because the shoe was 65 dollars, not 20 bucks. I would rather spend that money towards a pair of sneakers that will last more than two months.
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I always have been a fan of New Balance shoes but these are terrible. They are smaller in size and more narrow for my feet and are very uncomfortable. In the past, NB shoes have fit perfect in the size that I ordered. These seem to be of cheap quality and not the same as older New Balance shoes. I wonder if they are a cheap Chinese imitation of the real brand. I will not be ordering any more shoes online after this. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes do not fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I live in New Balance shoes, but these are terrible! I normally wear a 12 medium (D) but in these shoes I would require a 13 EE width! In addition, these shoes are so "shallow" that the orthotics I normally wear cannot be used. I have TRIED wearing them, but they hurt my feet too much!
customer_reviews.author: RobWms

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: One person stated that the Velcro straps are too long and can't be trimmed. I would agree with that. The first time I wore the shoes in my home as a test, I wasn't sure the shoes were going to fit. You need to "test" them in your home a couple of times in the morning before your feet swell. They're not bad shoes, but they're not as nice as previous NB that I have bought. I wouldn't buy a second pair of these. I have a pair that are exactly the same from Propet (sp) and those fit exactly right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: MarkW

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were returned
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were not made to fit well, or properly. The left shoe was far too tight, and it actually looked too small compared to the right shoe. (The right shoe was okay.) The straps were bulky and did not lie neatly on the velcro closures. My husband definitely could not wear them, and so they were returned. This was a disappointment, as he had worn New Balance sneakers for years, and has never had a problem with size before this.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great for walkers with low arches, but insufficient cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I have very low arches, which make New Balance shoes a good choice for me, as they have very little arch support built in. The shoes are well constructed and seemed comfortable, but after walking 3-4 miles each day for the past week I began my heals were quite sore and bruised due to insufficient cushioning. I added after-market inserts and this seems to do the trick. As noted in another review, out of the box the Velcro tabs are way too long for the smaller sizes. I wore them for a week before I noticed that New Balance thoughtfully marked and stitched the tabs so you can easily cut them to one of two smaller sizes. Duh.
customer_reviews.author: Aerieudite

customer_reviews.title: New balance walking-highest amazon rating.
customer_reviews.text: Right now i love it. New Balance has a sole that lasts 2 years with miles of walking. I must wait to see if the front of the shoe stays glued for at least 6months. You must order 1/2 size larger from New Balance. I am a 9 medium. New Balance's 928 V2 comes unglued in the front in 6 months. It is glued in China;but not glued and stitched. Water enters in while the shoe is still new. 2 year wear on sole also for the 928V@
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brunetto

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are heavy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit nicely however they felt heavy both in my hand and on my feet. I weighed the pair against another pair of New Balance (I've several) and the new shoes were about 1/2 pound heavier. I believe I'll return these as I've left tags on and have not worn except to try on. I want lighter shoes for walking. I also responded to the email from Premium Brand Outlet but I've not received a reply, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Mackintosh II

customer_reviews.title: Velcro strap
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the way the velcro strap was attached with a piece of elastic. This made the straps stick out past the main part of the shoe causing a potential fall hazard. In my opinion, this was a dumb idea. This reminds me of Murphy's Law,"What can happen will happen". You would be surprised what these straps sticking out can get caught on.
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddi

customer_reviews.title: VERY UGLY BUT VERY COMFY
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ugly.....BUT! They are some of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn and they have room to fit an insert. I’ve had them for 10 months and they’ve held up well except my right shoe has developed an embarrassing and annoying squeak so it’s time to move on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing New Balance walking shoes for many years, love them. My physical therapist is trying to reprogram my walking and balance and noted my daily shoes were not properly supporting my feet. Was due to fact that the shoes had gotten worn off the outside edge over the six years I had them. I was told to get rid of them once replaced, but I'm gonna try new inserts, since they are still intact other than the assymmetric wear pattern. Figured I'd try a Dr.Scholl pressure pattern scanner on the old shoes and get the recommended inserts. Just hate to trash such a well-constructed shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the 812!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give New Balance a two star review but these shoes are NOT that comfortable. I had two pair of NB 812 and they were light, flexible on top, and very comfortable to wear. These 813s, which are the replacement for the 812, are no where near as good. They are inflexible on top, seem heavy on the feet and are not comfortable for long periods of time. The only positive is that the fit was as expected. I would not buy these again and I supposed I'll have to try a different brand from New Balance. They had a good show; they should have left it alone.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shalhoub

customer_reviews.title: Back of shoe folds under when trying to put shoe on
customer_reviews.text: Did receive the shoes in fine condition and timely....shoes are nice and will work....New Balance did not make the back part of the shoe stiff enough to keep it from folding in when trying to put shoe on.....even shoe spoon leaves some trouble trying to get the shoes on!!!! Probably would not get them again knowing this problem exists.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: They changed the fit
customer_reviews.text: The older pair I have fit perfect from day one right down to today...they just look shabby....the new ones are narrower, smaller, less material, and much tighter....bought first pair in the store....simply ordered the second on line, they are no longer 100% american made, that probably accounts for the the design change to a cheaper product....SORRY.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W McFarland

customer_reviews.title: 4E Width
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that they came in gray, but . . . The pair has overly long Velcro and a very narrow tongue. If you look closely you can often see my husband’s sock. My guess is that it’s the same size tongue that works on a narrower shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapptstcityrv

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort and ease!
customer_reviews.text: Made well out of leather. I tried other brands that were not leather and they didn't last as long before they stretched out on the outsides an the next thing you knew, you were walking half on the sole and half off. Very comfortable and easy to adjust your fit with the Velcro straps and can be adjusted easily throughout the day. Easy to work with just the use of one hand, unlike having to tie with laces.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Webster

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second pair of these shoes after the first pair fit very comfortably. Because of foot surgery a long time ago, it is painful for me to wear traditional dress shoes. I bought a black pair of 813 and now wear them with a suit. Unless someone is looking very carefully (the logo is in black), they cannot tell these are walking type shoes. I have custom orthotics to use with these shoes, but I have also bought other orthotics that are just as comfortable. I like the velcro because it makes it easy to adjust the tension of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Seniors!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my elderly dad. His older pair were tuckered out and he needed a new pair or two. I got on Amazon and put in shoes for seniors and BAM! there was a pair very similar to what he had. Once they arrived (on time!) he said they were even better than those we were replacing. So we got another pair but dark brown and slightly different but just as satisfied. Outstanding! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabo81

customer_reviews.title: New Balance makes the best walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: 14 years ago a friend said I should try New Balance and I've never bought any walking shoe but New Balance since. There may have been other New Balance styles I have bought, I cannot recall, but I have never jumped ship to another vendor. I love New Balance! I ask for my size 14, 4E and I get my size 14, 4E. The shoes always fit, are very comfortable, and I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot 6X10

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and the velcro straps.
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of laces and went with the straps. This shoe fits pretty well, and is accepts custom insoles - but you must remove the original insoles or the shoe will become too shallow and too easy to twist ur ankle. Price is excellent for the benefit. Not heavy and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: alexdelara

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the width you are accused to in USA sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Need a good 2 strap at my age 87 because laces don't work. Specifically ordered a regular not a wide because this same great shoe from before relaxes after a few trial runs. Then too roomy and makes hitting the brake pedal a little tentative. I think they are going to work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Hasselbach

customer_reviews.title: Comfort + price = good value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the price. Very comfortable and easy to get on and off. The traction is fine for slick floors or pavement but not so good for outdoor activities. Not for hiking in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo Cat

customer_reviews.title: This Is No Substitute For The NB 812
customer_reviews.text: Other than the price this model is a very very poor quality shoe. The 812 wore like iron and was exceptionally comfortable. Actually the uppers and soles and velcro of the 812 are still fine. It is the synthetic collar cushioning which has broken down. So I still prefer my 6-7 or so year old USA 812 to my imported 813. Because of the price I'll keep them for back up when my old ones really wear down if ever they do.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Size great, foot support, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought New Balance exclusively for many years because of the extra wide models. These shoes fit as I expected but the flat, over firm lining at the ball of my feet is uncomfortable. I have worn them, and am embarrassed to attempt returning another product. I will try some inserts with an arch and foot cushioning and hope that makes them as comfortable as the New Balance shoes I've had in the past. I won't buy others online again however. Sports shoes should support foot shape . These just don't.
customer_reviews.author: Old Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Does not run true to sizes of other NB products. Is this a quality control issue?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this shoe size does not match other New Balance products. I have NB 623 cross training shoe and have a .5 inch free space from the end of my big toe to the front of the shoe. With the MB 813 my toe is right against the front on the shoe. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: A paying customer

customer_reviews.title: the fit perfect, look good and are easy for these old bones to fasten
customer_reviews.text: New Balance stores don’t carry all models and as my joints exhibit late life pain I needed the Velcro ties to ease putting on shoes. Bought these online, the fit perfect, look good and are easy for these old bones to fasten
customer_reviews.author: Shelton R. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old ones
customer_reviews.text: I had/have 4 NB walking and Tennis shoes, all 11 1/2 and 2e/wide. These are wider and doesn't fit like the others which fit great. Id return them but wore them outside and around a bit. Added an additional insert to the existing insert and still loose. Besides that they sure aren't stylist and the straps hang way out when you tighten them up. Look someplace else.
customer_reviews.author: TheDanceGuy

customer_reviews.title: Best New Balance shoe since the model 993
customer_reviews.text: Once the model 993 was no longer available, I tried several other brands and designs. When my last pair of walking shoes needed to be replaced, I checked to see what New Balance had to offer in a walking shoe with velcro closure. I found these and decided to try them out. I have been very pleased with this model. In addition to fitting well, they are amazingly light weight and very quiet when walking. I hope this model is still available when I need my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to spare
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of 813s. The first pair gave great service until the upper started to separate from the sole after a year of hard wear. The shoes fit true to sized and are quite comfortable. I especially like the stretch feature on Velcro straps. Some reviews mention problems with those straps, but I have never encountered any difficulty. The adjustability of the strap length is also a positive feature. If this new pair serves me as well as the first, I will probably be in the market for a third pair sometime down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sneaker that fits my dad!!
customer_reviews.text: We dread asking my father what he wants for his birthday , etc since he is short and portly ( as opposed to big and tall) . This year he wanted sneakers......problem: small wide feet ( I call them hobbit feet) . These sneakers fit perfectly: 8 extra, extra wide and the velcro is exactly what is needed for an 86 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Barnds-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: I needed support in the ankle after surgery.also required a wide 4E to accommodate a brace and velcro straps for easy on/off. i saw this shoe on prime days since they arrived haven't had pain in my ankle without the brace i am going to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Not my choice
customer_reviews.text: I have worn top-of-the-line New Balance walking shoes for years. I was very happy with the 927's. When they wore out, I bought the 928V2 replacement. I did not realize until too late that the new model had a tongue that was extra-thick at the top and made it very difficult for me to tie and untie the laces. Yet another example of a bad "improvement." After enough frustration, I ordered a pair of MW 813's, despite reading many negative comments about the fit. I now agree with the comments. The shoes were stiff and did not give me the balance I was accustomed to so I returned them and bought a pair of 577's with Velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: R. Landes

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable priced and comfortable but not long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are reasonably priced and were comfortable. They are now made out of the country and I have found that they don't hold up for the long hall. I am a heavy user and they start to look shabby in three to four months. They use to make a bone color which was more attractive but for reasons unknown by me they stopped making it and replaced them with these off gray color. If they held up longer I would give them a higher rating!
customer_reviews.author: RMK

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The automated reply on Amazon regarding fit is limited The fit was absolutely better than expected. I've been wearing NB for awhile and these perform well. Straps on this model are adjustable - they can be trimmed. The tongue of shoe could be wider. thanks NB for listening. Good product
customer_reviews.author: We BUY it - We REVIEW it

customer_reviews.title: not super stylish but a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: its a plain white shoe. built well, fits well and looks...like a white shoe. they may not have a lot of the styling cues so popular right now, but if you just need a shoe that will fit and stand up to daily use, these seem to fit the bill quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Generous toe box.
customer_reviews.text: These are a really good shoe for the price. Worked out well for my husband with his new orthotics. His right foot needs a little more room than the left. The toe box on this shoe provided that little x-tra for him. He's very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Did not like at all
customer_reviews.text: shipped on time, did not feel good on my feet, would not buy again, I donated them
customer_reviews.author: Floyd J Roe

customer_reviews.title: An improved model
customer_reviews.text: Bought the white ones first, then the black. New Balance has solved the problem that affected the Velcro attachments on earlier models by making the straps longer and marking them so you can trim the excess. The result is the Velcro straps hold the shoe properly. Comfortable and supportive, although I use it only for walking the dog in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. We couldn't find these locally. My husband has bad knees, and these shoes have enough support that they help him to be able to walk longer distances. He really likes these shoes! I plan to order more to have them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: tailor_made

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe Easy to Put On and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: With it's Velcro fasteners and wooden shoe look, the MW813V1 is not a style trend setter. But, if you're looking for a shoe that's quick to put on and take off and provides comfort, this is the shoe for you. Be sure to get the right width.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: The width was not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This was not wide by any stretch of the imagination. Quality was fair.
customer_reviews.author: NV Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance shoes are high quality in material, durable, and fit well. One nice feature about this shoe is the ability to trim the straps shorter. That's a good for us who have smaller feet. These are sturdy shoes for anyone with physical issues who needs stability.
customer_reviews.author: G. Newman

customer_reviews.title: He loves these
customer_reviews.text: The only kind and style of shoe my husband loves. He is very tough on shoes. Have to replace about every 6 months or so. These last longer than other brands. Made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to replace a pair of 812's that I loved. Well it turns out that I love these ...
customer_reviews.text: Size US 11 2E. I bought these to replace a pair of 812's that I loved. Well it turns out that I love these just as well! My feet tend to roll to the outside, so I buy shoes with a rollbar built in. These definitely don't disappoint. The closure straps are plenty long and the sole is plenty stable. The cut and fit is great. I have no doubt that they will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The NB MW813V1 is a great walking shoe, for me after hip surgery, when I could not bend over to tie laces. I am going to buy a second pair in a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mohn

customer_reviews.title: These work Great for me...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13 EEE, I ordered the 4E. They fit very well. I have severe Neuropathy, and often live with pain in my feet. There's some pain you just can't eliminate with shoes, but these have helped me out a great deal, I can't imagine going back to what I had before. Not only would I buy these shoes again, I am planning on it. Don't go by brand name, stick with what's best for you when you find it. For me, I am happy to stick with these. Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: cheap shoe wally qually at big price
customer_reviews.text: The main thing is the return piece for the velcro strap. It is a plastic loop which is sewn into the shoe with elastic. It looks like instant failure, or at best a very short life. Overall shoe has a very cheap look/feel, not very supportive. I will go to a shoe store. Big fat old man, that's a hard row to hoe, but gotta get shoes to get myself better.
customer_reviews.author: tech hater

customer_reviews.title: They use to be made of  better quality, but
customer_reviews.text: They use to be made of better quality, but not anymore. These sneakers came apart within a few months.....very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: BellaD

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off.  Perfect for flight security checks.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were true to size. The fault of wrong size is mine and mine alone; I probably should have ordered a half size smaller. To compensate I took inserts from my nearly worn out New Balance softball cleats to fill space. I really enjoy the convenience of the hook n loop fastening system.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 93-year old dad. He barely takes them off! They’re so easy to get on and off. Good quality. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: The Fit Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my better half...he loves these shoes. I have ordered several pairs of different New Balance Shoes for him over the years a lot like these but he says these are the most comfortable shoes he has ever worn. I will definately be ordering again. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: netsue1964

customer_reviews.title: but I think that my New Balance brand hook and loop walking shoes are great, an one of the best shoes of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought hook and loop type shoes from amazon.com for a few years. I bought different brands, but I think that my New Balance brand hook and loop walking shoes are great, an one of the best shoes of this type I have ever owned. These shoes fit well, wears well, and feels great all day. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Reed McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Only the sole is wide
customer_reviews.text: I think they made it wider by giving it a wider sole but they seemed too use the same amount of material in the upper. The pressure at the base of my toes was painful and the tongue barely closed the gap between the sides. The tongue pulled out of one side or the other on the first step or two.
customer_reviews.author: jmseligson

customer_reviews.title: NEW BALANCE IS ALWAYS TOP QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this style New Balance for many years. They are top quality and they always stand behind their product. I have 3 pair in use right now, 1 for everyday wear, 1 for walking and my newest pair for dress up. :) I am 80 years old and if I live long enough I will be buying New Balance again.
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair only because I took what used to be my good shows and made then a work pair. These are very comfortable shoes and I love the Velcro. You can leave them Velcroed and just slip in and out, no need to redo every time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Norm S

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I find these shoes quick and easy to put on, and I can get a few thousand miles of walking (on pavement) before the heels wear out and some of the seams split. A good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Solosurvivor

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because I was having hip surgery and I knew that during recovery, bending over far enough to tie laces would be difficult. I wanted a shoe I could slip on with a velcro closure. I bought similar shoes from the same manufacturer a few years back and got good service from them. However, this pair had the soles start to separate after only a few months of light use. The other negative is that the velcro straps are about twice as long as they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are not too heavy and yes they are very comfortable and because of the Velcro easy to " lace ...
customer_reviews.text: I got them and have been wearing them now for half hour and had to write this review after reading a lot of negative ones. No, they are not too heavy and yes they are very comfortable and because of the Velcro easy to " lace ".They look great and feel great and I don't think I need extra insoles. So, there. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: stefan vladescu

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good!
customer_reviews.text: I have size 8.5 feet, NOT wide. These fit perfectly. Worth the cost. I've never had any problems with NB products, and for me the fit is better than Reebok or Nike shoes that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kronk

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product has given me a severely bad headache and caused me trouble sleeping. It is not the same look that was ordered. This shoe has ugly black writing on the tongue of the shoe. This shoe is ugle and I wish to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Product
customer_reviews.text: After buying 3 other big brand names, none of which fit right and all the same size, I found these. Two simple velcro pulls and you're out the door. Comfortable, good looking shoe and it only cost 66 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Lenon

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this shoe for everyday wear because it is supposed to be good for people with diabetes I find it to be immediately comfortable. They ought to sell them with additional insoles to replace them when they get to compressed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great after an injury
customer_reviews.text: I had an injury causing the loss of use of one arm for a time - these are a life-saver. Tieing a shoe - seemingly impossible; hook & loop: problem solved. Comfortable, these are designed to be worn with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer999

customer_reviews.title: Diabetic dad loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad - he’s older now so he struggles tying his shoes and he’s tripped over his shoe laces. He absolutely loves how comfortable and wide they are for his feet.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Yay , Longer Straps n Trimable!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, really good. Wore twice. Nice cushiony feel. The straps are long unlike the 812 style which were way too short...for me. And, you can shorten by cuting off small sections of the straps. Duh! About time NB hired a genius. Minus 1 star because of the plain look. But, I can't tie laces (sucks), so I have limited choices.
customer_reviews.author: jakey

customer_reviews.title: Half size larger is smaller??
customer_reviews.text: I wear NB 9.5 X 4E. The left shoe is a little snug, so I ordered size 10 4E. The left shoe in this size is smaller than the 9.5 I already wear. I am going to wear them anyway, hoping they will stretch. I took out the arch support that came with the shoe, and substituted better ones.
customer_reviews.author: N. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I went to the new balance store and had them check my size. They said I needed a 10.5D and I have always worn a 9.5 or 10 in similar New Balance. I ordered these in 10.5 and am well pleased with them. I don't know if my feet grew or the NEW BALANCE shoes run small. I think they are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I have diabetes and have had foot problems in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few pairs of New Balance walking shoes in the past and I have liked them all but these are much to wide. The shoes don't provide enough arch support or side support.
customer_reviews.author: CJ - NORCAL

customer_reviews.title: I've worn this style for years
customer_reviews.text: I was fit for this style perhaps eight years ago by an orthopedic shoe specialist. Two years or so after that, I added orthotic inserts. I love this shoe. Lately it has been hard to find. I wonder if the style is being phased out. I was glad to get two pairs on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Father Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Great supporting shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father, who has been having knee trouble and he absolutely loves them. He needed the added support and these shoes delivered. He also liked that he can cut the Velcro straps so that they were fitting perfectly with the shoe itself. Overall, he has no complaints about these shoes and has even purchased them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Patrick

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC FOR HANDICAPPED PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: I AM PARTIALLY PARALYZED. MY OLD SHOES WOULD SLIP WHEN I TRIED TO STAND UP. PLUS THE PROBLEM WITH SHOELACES. CAN’T TIE ONE HANDED. VELCRO STRAPS CURED THAT. PLUS THE SHOES GRIP THE FLOOR WELL. NO SLIPPING. BIG DEAL! IN SHORT I LOVE THEM. RECCOMEND THEM TO ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I reordered a size bigger because of old man foot spread. Husband is very happy with the shoes. Comfortable, walking and standing shoes for long hours at work.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chutes

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate purchase but I love New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this is the 1st New Balance shoe that has not met my expectations on any level. Unfortunately, the time has lapsed for me to return these shoes. this shoe runs big and doesn't offer much support.
customer_reviews.author: 4HIM

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and valve
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on 2nd pair he liked the first ones so much he wanted a second pair he cant use his right arm so the velcro straps are a plus
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I Shoe is very comfortable for walking but could have better arch support. I especially like the ability to shorten the straps to fit my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Davis

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is being treated for cancer. His feet are swollen and he is unable to get into any of his shoes. I have found some for him that fit but are too heavy and he has tripped while wearing them. These are wonderful. He can get them on by himself and they're light but supported. I went back and bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe For The Money
customer_reviews.text: The size 11 4E fits as expected. I had ordered the 10.5 4E and the 11.5 4E because this is the first time I've ordered New Balance shoes. Based on the measurements I took of my feet, the factory recommended11 4E but said a 10.5 4E would probably fit if I don't have a lot of callouses. Unfortunately, I do have them on my left foot making the smaller shoe somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tx Monty

customer_reviews.title: My go-to shoe supplier.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is the only athletic shoe supplier that gives me the fit and comfort I need. I have switched from laces to hook & loop because of my age and minor back problems, and these shoes fit just as well as the laced ones.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Jack

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the shoes for my Dad. He loves these shoes and often comments on how comfortable they feel. He also enjoys the convenient velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe for the money with quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have lymphedema and even with the wraps the shoes fit comfortable like slippers extremely comfortable the elastic Velcro wraps make each to fasten and shoes clean very easily will order again
customer_reviews.author: Joann sadler

customer_reviews.title: Easy On.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Son who wears braces. The plan was to get a shoe that could expand but not look like it was built for someone older. Good product that opens up well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Shoe by New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how nice these look and fit. If you have trouble tying shoe laces, these are the perfect alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Luvn Texas

customer_reviews.title: “Old Man Shoes”
customer_reviews.text: I walk 2 miles a day on cement. These shoes sounded good. Regrettably, Although i am 65 and I can’t wear these shoes until I am 85. Style still matters.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The shoes came as advertised in good packaging and on time
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came as advertised in good packaging and on time. I suppose the only thing that took me aback was that the shoes were gray not white. I may have made the wrong selection but frankly I thought I had ordered white. Regardless, the shoes look nice fit nice and are very utilitarian. They are well cushioned and as you would expect no break in because of the comfort that has been built into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Hinman

customer_reviews.title: Great design abd crafting
customer_reviews.text: This is the third iteration I’ve purchased of NB hook and loop walking shoes. Like att previous shoes, these are excellent. I did note that both the tongue and the straps are a bit longer: excellent design imptovements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this model for several years as it is the only shoe that works for my diabetes with a large toe box. Comfortable, easy to take off and put back on for TSA check-ins. My 5th pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is spot on, but earlier I had bought a different style at a New Balance store and ordered the same size. Mine are 11.5 2E and I trimmed the end of the closure strap back on the first cut line. I first used inserts by Dr. ##### and they squeaked so I put in NB inserts and I'm quiet now.
customer_reviews.author: T S Mann

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mw813v1 Hook and Loop Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Enjoy a smooth and steady ride with every stride, thanks to the motion-control technology of the New Balance 813 walking shoes. These comfortable walking shoes are constructed with a ROLLBAR stability post system that helps control rear-foot movement for enhanced support while you walk. Designed to promote a proper stride, this adult walking shoe is equipped with Walking Strike Path technology in the outsole that helps to stabilize and guide your feet through a natural walking gait cycle so you can keep moving in comfort. A lightweight foam midsole and soft Comfort Collar provide additional cushioning and support with every step. To help ensure your feet look as good as they feel, these New Balance walking shoes feature supple leather uppers with classic New Balance branding and a secure closure. Resilient rubber soles complete the sturdy and stylish package, providing durability for everyday wear on a variety of surfaces. Whether for walking, working or participating in light workouts, these cushioned walking shoes offer supportive comfort that can help protect your feet. Select styles of the 813 may be eligible for Medicare reimbursement with Medicare/HCPCS code A5500.
feature_bullets: Stay on Steady Ground: These comfortable New Balance walking shoes are crafted with a ROLLBAR stability post system that helps control rear-foot movement for enhanced support with every step
Foot Friendly: Step out in comfort with cushioned walking shoes designed to keep you moving. The 813 may be eligible for Medicare reimbursement with Medicare/HCPCS Code A5500
Walk Naturally: The 813 adult walking shoe from New Balance features Walking Strike Path technology in the outsole to help stabilize and guide the foot through a natural walking gait cycle
Built for Lasting Comfort: Enjoy the comfort and durability of sturdy and stylish walking shoes, featuring supple leather uppers and resilient rubber soles that stand up to regular wear-and-tear
Cushioned Comfort: This walking shoe for adults features a lightweight foam midsole and soft Comfort Collar for supportive cushioning that fits your active lifestyle.
